CompoundIndexLimit.Message: vCore based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB supports a maximum of 32 fields in a compound index. You would need to reduce the number of fields in the compound index.

Geospatial2dIndex.Message: Set up preview features in Azure subscription are not enabled by default on vCore based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB. Please enable the capability on your account before migration.

MoreInfo.label: Set up preview features in Azure subscription

GeoHaystackIndex.Message: GeoHaystack indexes are deprecated and are not supported in vCore based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.
